description: Demolition of existing garage and erection of single storey front/side extension, single storey side/rear extension and two storey side extension
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission. Reason: As required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990, as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority. Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The roof of the single storey extension hereby permitted shall not be converted or used as a balcony or a sitting out area, and no access shall be gained except for maintenance purposes.Reason: To protect the amenities and privacy of the adjoining residential properties in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Oak End by its title has the right of gaining access to and from Oak End with or without vehicles of every description to pass and repass over and along the road or roads, road sites and paths constructed on the Coombe End Estate. Golf Club Drive forms part of the Coombe End Estate.These rights do not include a right to park on or place goods on the roads and sites of Coombe End Estate and they do not include a right for third parties to enter upon or park on any part of the premises which comprise part of Coombe Hill Golf Club's leasehold interest in the land which comprise Coombe Hill Golf Club.
The submitted floor plans are not labelled as proposed. Please provide Proposed Floor Plans at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example).
Description will be finalised after we receive all the documents.
